Ctrl+N: new form
Ctrl+O: open dfm
Ctrl+Shift+R: reload actual dfm file
Ctrl+Shift+C: batchconvert (bin<>txt-dfm)
Ctrl+R: load resource

Ctrl+B: toggle binary form
Ctrl+S: save DFM-file
Ctrl+Alt+S: save output
Ctrl+Shift+S: save to binary file
Ctrl+U: create pas-file (unit)
Ctrl+G: generate runtime-code

Ctrl+P: preview form
Ctrl+Shift+P: preview form using existing output
Ctrl+H: toggle "show hidden"
Ctrl+E: toggle "enable disabled controls"

Ins: add object
Ctrl+Ins: add property
Shift+Ins: add entry
Enter: edit
Delete: delete

Ctrl+Up: move up
Ctrl+Down: move down
Ctrl+Shift+Up: move top
Ctrl+Shift+Down: move bottom

Ctrl+Shift+U: remove unwanted properties

Ctrl+I: internet-update

F1: show helpfile
Shift+F1: show Aboutbox

Ctrl+Alt+O: preferences-dialog

F3: search again
Ctrl+A: mark all text in current memo

in Preview:
Ctrl+C: copy selected Control
Ctrl+X: cut selected control
Ctrl+V: paste copied/cut Control

in Objectinspector:
Enter: set property-value
Esc: reset property-value
Tab: move to next property
Shift+Tab: move to previous property
